Description:
We are seeking a highly motivated and talented Software Engineer Intern to join our team in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia. As a Software Engineer Intern, you will work closely with our development team to gain hands-on experience in developing and maintaining software applications. This internship will provide you with the opportunity to learn and grow in a fast-paced and dynamic environment.Responsibilities:Collaborate with the development team to design, develop, test, and deploy software applications.
Assist in gathering and analyzing user requirements to create technical specifications.
Write clean, efficient, and maintainable code using programming languages such as Java, C++, or Python.
Debug and resolve software defects and issues reported by users.
Participate in code reviews and provide constructive feedback to improve code quality.
Conduct research and keep up-to-date with the latest industry trends and technologies.
Assist in the documentation of software design, architecture, and user manuals.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure software applications meet customer requirements and expectations.
Contribute to the continuous improvement of software development processes and methodologies.
Adhere to coding standards and best practices to ensure high-quality software delivery.Skills
Skills:
Currently pursuing a Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field.
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
Ability to work both independently and collaboratively in a team environment.
Passion for software development and willingness to learn new technologies.
Knowledge of programming languages such as Java, C++, or Python.
Familiarity with software development tools and frameworks.
Experience with version control systems (e.g., Git) is a plus.
Understanding of database concepts and SQL.
Knowledge of web development technologies (e.g., HTML, CSS, JavaScript) is a plus.

Strong problem-solving and analytical skills
Excellent written and verbal communication skills
Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a team
Proficiency in programming languages like Java, C++, or Python
Familiarity with software development tools and frameworks
